payload.name: SWE
payload.purpose:
To drive new approaches with strong opinions, held lightly. Embracing lean. Hence learning. No best practices when emerging practices are required. 
We cannot learn without experimenting and options. Failure is acceptable, just fail fast, learn fast.

payload.name: Hard parts of software architecture
payload.detect: Huge legacy apps where "migrating" to new architecture would be big business: we need to build capabilities in that domain

payload.name: Business Modeling
payload.detect: We are using Water-Scrum-Fall lacking of business modeling so we end up with problems towards the middle-end of the projet

payload.name: Hard parts of software architecture
payload.detect: Huge legacy apps where "migrating" to new architecture would be big business: we need to build capabilities in that domain

payload.name: Business Modeling
payload.detect: We are using Water-Scrum-Fall lacking of business modeling so we end up with problems towards the middle-end of the projet

payload.name: Lack of trainings
payload.detect: Trainings are too generic. We get external trainings but this is not aligned with our goals.

payload.name: Learn it all
payload.detect: We need to change from "know it all" to "learn it all"

payload.name: Learn it all
payload.detect: We need to change from "know it all" to "learn it all"

payload.name: Lean IT
payload.detect: Lean IT could help improve across the organisation

payload.name: Legacy
payload.detect: We support our customers with legacy systems that are more and more expensive to maintain: ROI is dropping sharply and investment for future solutions is eaten by legacy.

payload.name: Lack of AI
payload.detect: We are passively resisting AI... We need to build capabilities around AI.

payload.name: CI/CD
payload.detect: CI/CD is not implemented as it should be. The end2end process is slow, relying on hands-off

payload.name: IDP
payload.detect: To get a software project started takes ages, we reinvent the wheel all the time. That is expensive. We need to deliver a software platform on demand
